index.aboutTitle: I do a bit of everything
index.aboutText: I work in the field of web development and have been fond of it for over 3 years. I enjoy doing this and I am constantly developing in this direction and trying to learn more about this area. In the skill section you can see what skills I managed to master and what I am studying
